job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: pWe are looking Software Engineers to join our growing software development team The ideal candidate is someone who has experience with Python Django Postgres SQL and JavascriptnbspThey are a team player possessing strong analytical as well as technical skills and are able to communicate the logic behind technical decisions to nontech stakeholders If you want to join a company with AMAZING culture and a company that has been awarded one of the BEST Places to Work in San Diego for multiple years in a row look no furtherwelllook a bit morefor the details belowppstrongWhat you will be doingstrongpulliDesigning implementing researching and managing software programsliliTesting and evaluating new programsliliIdentifying areas for modification in existing programs and subsequently developing these modificationsliliWriting and implementing efficient codeliliDetermining operational practicalityliliDeveloping quality assurance proceduresliliDeploying software tools processes and metricsliliMaintaining and upgrading existing systemsliliHelping junior team member learnliliWorking closely with other developers UX designers businesses and systems analystsliulpstrongWhat you can dostrongpulliMinimum 5 years of Software Dev experiencelili1 year of professional experience working in a medium size Django or Flask codebaseliliKnowledge about design and implementation of the basic data structures required to solve most common realworld problems effectivelyliliFast motivated and quick to pivot with feature changes Obsessed about software qualityliliMeticulous and organized approach to workliliSolid understanding of the core Python language and its standard library or at a minimum similar understanding on any other modern scripting language such as Ruby JavaScript PHP etc plus willing to learn amp master Python toolili1 year of professional experience working in a medium size Django or Flask codebaseliulpnbspppstrongTechnologies amp programming languages we usestrongppNote Not all of these are required but the more experience you have with these the betterpulliPythonliliDjangoliliFlaskliliRubyliliJavaScript programming skills including at least one JavaScript framework eg React Angular or VuejsliliDatabase skills including schemas and ORMsliulpstrongCompany PerksstrongpulliBonusesliliIncredible company culture with a relaxed vibeliliSuper fun and creative coworkersliliFull benefits including a generous 401k matchliulpbrp
